name: Neobum
description:
This game was made for the 2021 Bullet Hell Jam for the theme: 10 seconds! Special thanks to lightvgm for the music!

How To Play:
  • WASD or ARROW KEYS to move.
  • You kill the enemies by touching them.
  • There is a 10 second timer ticking down (the top bar). If it reaches zero you and all the enemies die - with a score bonus
  • By killing a white enemy, you restore some time
  • By killing a blue enemy, you restore some health
  • If you die, you lose a life - you have 3
If you have problems with the web build, please download the game. It should be faster, and more stable.
